name: Home in Brooklyn · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 6 beds · 1.5 baths

reviews.comments:
Very good place, not so far away from Manhattan.
Comfortable, well equipped, super clean.
The neighborhood is ok.
The host was responsive and I’ve enjoyed my stay.

A wonderful home with an excellent host! They were very communicative, helpful,  kind, and friendly! They responded quite quickly whenever I had a question and offered help when I needed it. I would absolutely recommend this beautiful home to those who visit NYC and the surrounding area!
good place I love it very clean host responsevery quickly no worry good place I would book it again

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The hosts were great with accommodating to us, arriving early and leaving a bit later. Looks identical to the photos, maybe even a larger space than what is shown! It’s fairly close to bus stops to get into the city however, around that specific area we couldn’t find too much to do - which was okay as we wanted to explore the city, depends on what you want! Would definitely stay here again.
Good, quiet location. Clean and comfortable beds and nice couch to hang out on.
Excellent value, lots of space, comfortable and clean, lots of dishes, and great responsive communication.  Great place and parking included!

I’ve stayed at quite a few Airbnb’s in different states and countries and this is by far in my top 5.  The accommodations were just as described if not better. The place was cleaned spotless. They spared no expense in remodeling the house. It’s a spacious 3 bedrooms, 1.5 baths with a great back yard space. We didn’t get to enjoy the back yard,  b/c it was cold and rained one of the days we were there. As a NY who hasn’t lived there in over 20 years I typically dread going back, b/c parking is a nightmare and most of my families homes don’t have AC, but the boiler heater system. It was great walking into a home with units in every room. To think I almost forgot this added bonus…the washing machine and dryer in the unit. The host also reached out to several days prior & upon check, then daily afterwards to ensure things were going well. I hope this place is available every time I visit my mom from here on, b/c I would stay here again and again.

name: Rental unit in Queens · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Rental unit in Queens · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
Rental unit in Queens · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
Rental unit in Queens · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
Rental unit in New York · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath

reviews.comments: Fantastic apartment, fantastic host! We bookmarked this property for next time, as we will be returning.

name: Bed and breakfast in Brooklyn · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · Half-bath
Rental unit in New York · ★4.69 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath

reviews.comments: Great apartment in a safe neighborhood. Location is good. A lot of convenient stores you can get to in walking distance. Beds are comfortable. Will stay here again next time in Manhattan.

Nice apartment, very nice location.
Clean apartment , and great host.
Recommended

Great place ! The host was really responsive and answered all our questions. my family and I had a great stay. The host let us check-in early which was great. I would definitely recommend Nathan's place.

A very good location near the Q and 6 trains, there are also nearby bus stations and a supermarket. The place was very clean and the WiFi is fast. It is also quite spacious compared to hotel room here. The only thing I did not like is the fact that I asked for early check in because my flight was arriving early in the morning but they said it won’t be available before 3 despite the fact that the previous guest did leave on time and they made it available for the next guest earlier than the check in time.
But overall it is a very nice apartment and would love to stay here again next time I come to NY.
The apartment was great and very easy to get to. The host made is smooth sailing and were super helpful.

Perfect location for a stay in New York, walking distance to the museum mile and subway close by. The apartment is super nice and Nathan was very quick to respond to our questions. I definitely would stay here again.
Great location and very comfortable stay. Check in and general communication was really good also so would recommend.

It was an excellent place, with  good transport, nice restaurants , near the most important places in New York and very clean, but I think that it needs needs a safety lock inside the main  door. Thanks we were very happy there.
Great place, great location, easy check in and check out, and a superb price compared to other New York accommodation options. Would definitely stay again.
Amazing value for upper east time, exactly as described !
Great location! Very clean. It was perfect for our week-long vacation. The bed was comfortable and the kitchen had everything we needed.

It's an amazing location and the apartment is great for the price and location. The apartment has a nice couch that extends to a bed which is comfortable.
I had to use a bucket to shower which was difficult to manage with two kiddos in the house. The hot water was coming out scalding and my kids were struggling to manage the temp in the shower, so I got a bucket to mix the water to get the right temp and we showered. I reached out to Nathan and there wasn't much they could do so the bucket was the option I went with.
Great location!
appartamento caldo e accogliente, situato in una buona posizione. 2 linee di metro abbastanza vicine all'appartamento e alcuni punti di interesse da raggiungere a piedi. lo consigliamo

Nathan's place was ideally located. The upper east side of Manhattan is close to all my favourite places. The Met is a 20 minute walk away. The JP Morgan museum and MOMA are 30 mins away. Plus, being a bit of an Australian coffee snob there is a great little cafe (Ella's) which is a two minute walk away. They do good pastries and an acceptable coffee :-)
Highly recommended.
Thank you! 💕

name: Rental unit in Queens · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
Rental unit in Queens · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
Rental unit in New York · ★4.87 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 3 baths

reviews.comments: Seamless stay
Everything was really nice, the host was friendly and helpful and the price was good for that area, you have everything close to the apartment.

I had a pleasant stay at this Airbnb. While I didn't spend much time in the space, it served its purpose perfectly for a comfortable sleep and shower. Everything worked seamlessly, and the location was very convenient. Would recommend for a hassle-free stay.
Very quiet place. Very good Room and bed. well located. Greg was Very kind. thank you so much!

Great stay! Comfy bed, perfect amount of space for what I was looking for. No problem with shared bathrooms and space was clean and tidy. Shared space so could hear people entering but no problems with noise- I slept so well! Greg provided quick responses and was helpful.  Would stay again.
La estancia de Greg muy buena , buen sitio y la limpieza fenomenal. Agradecida !
Super clean and perfect location! Also the cleaner was such a sweetheart and super helpful! Will definitely book again!
Place is as described. Had a great stay with no problems. It's on the 3rd floor with stairs only (no elevator).

L’ alloggio è perfetto per una vacanza a New York se avete voglia di vivere assolutamente la città, la zona è discreta
A 10 minuti da macy’s e poi 15 da Times Square, ben fornita dalla metro soprattutto da herald square
La stanza non è enorme ma per due persone che hanno poche pretese va bene, bagno in condivisione buono, veniva pulito ogni giorno
Per il prezzo che abbiamo pagato va più che bene visto che la media è ben più superiore
So comfortable place
La ubicación del lugar es la mejor, hay muchas cosas por hacer alrededor y todo muy tranquilo. Sin duda volvería a elegir el lugar
Neat, cozy place.

Greg's place was very conveniently located within walking distance of Penn Station and the venue where I was attending classes. Many shops, restaurants, and major landmarks are likewise within walking distance. Bathrooms didn't have a lock on the inside, but didn't consider that a problem. Wi-Fi wasn't that reliable, but it wasn't an issue because I had my own mobile hotspot. I will gladly stay at Greg's place again next time I'll be in New York City.

where to start?  host is not upfront about location - he sent me another address after i paid - the exact location is a sketchy entrance with 10 locks - i had to try every lock to find keys - very frustrating and he was not reachable at some point - poor communication during the process - i would not stay here again - he doesn’t live in nyc - host needs to be clear in the description  - i give him a 3 star only because of nearby towns  but not again
Great guy

name: Rental unit in New York · ★4.33 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 3 baths

reviews.comments: A good find in pricey Manhattan.  Great location …walking distance to Peen Station and Madison Square Garden.  Greg is a very responsive host and answered any inquiries immediately   Very comfortable bed and also very clean.
Just what I needed for a short visit.

Excelente ubicación, además siempre muy atento y respondió rápido los mensajes.
Definitivamente me quedare ahí en mi próxima visita a la ciudad.

Once I figured out which keys unlocked which doors (there were many) I was all good! My first time renting a room and it was a lovely experience. The apartment was clean and quiet. I would recommend staying here if you’re planning on being out and about all day. I had plans to explore the city and this was perfect for that- I really only slept there.
Was not quick to respond and did not accommodate a refund despite booking the wrong dates.
Excelente ubicación para moverse en la ciudad
Great spot!

The room was clean and Greg replied almost instantly to all our questions. It is a very small place with a small bed, but that is all we basically needed for our city trip to NY. The location couldn’t be better, right in the middle of midtown next to Empire State, a great place to discover the most important landmarks of the city.

Great value for the area. Amazing location. Unfortunate, the other guests were so loud and the rooms so closed to each other. The water in the shower takes forever to be almost hot. It was a great stay until something in the fridge was taken. The host could not do anything for it. The floors are cold. The heater had a smell. Little things here and there that turned a 5/5 into a 3/5.
편리한 위치에 자리 잡고 있고, 내부 화장실이나 부억이 깨끗해서 좋았습니다. 또한, 방에 청결도도 높았습니다. 다만 체크인할 때 어떻게 들어오는지 파악하는 게 다소 어려웠습니다! 그 점 빼고는 다 좋았습니다!

I was nervous about the place because of the low price but this place exceeded my expectations! Extremely clean, had everything in the description, excellent heating (and it was cold outside!) The bathrooms were immaculate and there were two of them on our side of the apartment. The only thing that could’ve been a little more clear was the checkin process with the stickers, as they were very hard to see to tell which room was mine, but that was easily fixable. The best part was without a doubt the location. 10/10, would book again!
Great place to stay

name: Rental unit in Brooklyn · 1 bedroom · 1.5 shared baths

reviews.comments: Over priced
The place did the job for our stay. However,    we thought it was over priced given the location. Additionally, the place was not clean - there was a dead cockroach in the bathroom.

The process in the beginning was alright other than being sent another address than the one listed which was understandable after being told the original listed address had burnt down. Once I checked in everything was alright until about after an hour or two I began to hear what may have been an animal in the vents. Once this sound began an EXTREME putrid smell began to cover the house as well. So bad that I had to walk out to get fresh air and my friend I booked with was repeatedly vomiting. Although it was hard to sleep with and was very strong we decided to try to stick it out for the night. In the morning the smell was still there so we contacted the owner of the Airbnb and were told they may be able to send somebody, but this never happened and they just ghosted us. Two weeks later I still have yet to receive a response even after trying to obtain a partial refund due to the distress. I had to contact with Airbnb support to receive any help - A decent stay but would not book again

Had to sleep elsewhere, all sheets and pillow cases were dirty and stained. It had a very  overwhelming smell of sewerage. Just to breath we had to open all windows even though it was 30 degrees outside. Horrible experience. Stuck where no where to go and home that should be condemned until sewage is fixed.

Tutto perfetto, tranne una puzza continua di fogna e aria calda non funzionante, siamo stati 2 giorni con l’aria accesa ma non è cambiato nulla. Non il meglio considerando che abbiamo soggiornato il 14 di Dicembre.
A spacious place in an interesting location.  Host was very speedy in terms of communication.

Loved the apartment was perfect! Center of town!
Everything was walkable.
grocery at the corner.
Host was super friendly and amazing!
Will be back again!
Logement sale et angoissant ( en sous sol )

Home in Brooklyn · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath

reviews.comments: Very gracious and compassionate host. I ran into an unexpected issue he worked with, which I greatly appreciate. His location is close to so many great restaurants, shops, and a walkable distance to the bay! An excellent for the price.

name: Home in Brooklyn · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath

reviews.comments: Nice area to live
Great stay. place was as pictured. Sheva gave excellent directions made checking in very simple and easy.
A great place to stay location is perfect right by the 2345 trains the host was very accommodatable and made the stay perfect would definitely book again

The place was very spacious and exactly as described, it was roomy enough to fit all 5 of us. All appliances are updated and/or new. Safe neighborhood and a very short walk to the metro. Thanks for hosting us!
A good and nice warm place! Near to subway Kingston AV!
Very beautiful place.  Great location.  Safe neighborhood.  Easy access to trains
au top ! merci beaucoup !
Thank you very much for everything! The location was great and the house bery big and clean. I would definitely recommend it.
It was amazing and Comfortable. I enjoyed my stay, great communication
Great host! Great space. Would highly recommend.
Sheva was extremely helpful and patient. Highly recommend 💙
Todo muy bien me pareció muy acogedor el hospedaje aquí muchas gracias
Sheva was a great host! She responded promptly, offered clear instructions, and the apartment not only matches the photos but exceeds expectations. A definite 5-star experience!
Excellent everything! Great place, great host.
Very Good host

name: Rental unit in Brooklyn · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2 baths

reviews.comments: Gus was super responsive and it was a very smooth process checking in and out. Great value and location! Nice cafés and shops nearby.
The place was peaceful and very accommodating. The room is really small so if you’re claustrophobic, it is not for you. But all in all, it was a decent place to stay.

name: Home in Brooklyn · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
Rental unit in Brooklyn · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath

reviews.comments: The host was great, she let me feel at home and definitely was very hospitable. The space was definitely worth the time.
Great place to stay.

The space and the host are great. Very easy to find, get into and even find parking (well, parking was easy relative to the general area). Super clean and well appointed. The host is very accommodating, proactively communicative and helpful. I only gave 4/5 on location and price trying to be fair. I could have gotten less expensive if I didn't want/need to be in the specific neighborhood and this is the most affordable in the general area. I was by myself but it would easily accommodate 4 . I'm not a city guy at all, but the location is convenient to places to eat, shopping, parks, the Botanical Gardens and the art museum. When I need to come into the neighborhood again I will certainly look to see if this is available again. I would highly recommend this unit or any of the host's other listings.
Great little gem just around the corner from shops and transit.  The perfect home base for exploring NYC.
Great place, plenty of room, very clean, Miriam was very responsive. The neighborhood was a little sketchy, but we knew that going in. We used it as a launching point to visit the city.
Beautiful place and the host was very helpful
a great stay! it was my the first time staying at an airbnb before, and this was lovely! easy to locate, great food surrounding the area, and the stay was very cozy! thank you!
Nice place will come back again

name: Place to stay in New York · ★4.45 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath

reviews.comments:
I normally don’t leave reviews.
The place was clean, spacious and to the point. A bed, great lighting, quiet and close to the subway. I honestly could live there with that set up. I’d love to use this spot regularly if possible.

This place was close to the train and the bus stop was right at the corner of the street. Walked around during the day and night and felt safe at all time. Locals were very helpful as well.
The communication was amazing, couldn’t ask for a better response rate. We had some minor issues but Christina immediately rushed to rectify the situation and solved everything in a timely manner. The apt had everything we needed and was close to everything as well. I recommend!

Es un buen sitio, necesita actualizar el baño, por lo demás está súper bien. El vecindario y el edificio son un poco antiguos y puede ser inseguro si se quiere llegar muy tarde. Es bastante retirado de las estaciones del metro. Cristina un a excelente anfitriona, siempre estuvo atenta a mis solicitudes.
Très très réactif propose beaucoup de chose l’une des meilleures hote merci beaucoup christina ! Elle m’a rendu un énorme service et elle est toujours là quand vous avez besoin
We had a great stay at Christina’s Harlem apartment. Convenient location, clean and appreciated her good communication for the stay.

1. Location was convenient to public transportation.
2. Building was not the cleanest.
3. The distribution of power in unit is not good. Turned on heater (It was 20 degrees in NY) and the power went out in unit. After several attempts to reset power in unit I still did not have power. I had to take a shower in the dark utilizing cell phone light. The support person did come over that night and reconfigured power distribution so that heater could be used for the rest of my stay.
4. The internet went out on the 2nd day which required rebooting of router.
5. The bathroom needs maintenance - Stains on ceiling and the shower does drain. It was like taking a shower and bath at the same time.
6. Overall I will not consider this location in the future.
I would definitely stay again
Noisy area and thin walls…could hear neighbors arguing as though they were right in front of us. Space was clean and spacious and was close to family
Would stay again 100%! Christina is very nice and there’s parking right at the apartment. It’s very convenient and affordable!

name: Rental unit in New York · ★4.69 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 shared bath

reviews.comments: My parents lived there for about a week. The landlord kindly offered help that he could provided. It was a very nice experience for them. Definitely vote for a decent stay at NYC.
Gregorio is a great guy. The place was nice and clean, and in a great part of the city. Very convenient to commute.

Gregorio is a very good host, his place is clean, bright and very nicely decorated, the apartment is in a nice location  and near the subway.As a host Gregorio was on had to answer any questions i had for getting around the city to where he would recommend eating locally, which is always useful. All in all staying in Gregorio place was more like staying with a friend then a host! i highly recommend his place.

My stay in Gregorio's house was just perfect. Like a home away from home really.
This place was perfect. I really enjoyed myself...
Gregorio is a wonderful host, very helpful and very understanding towards me and what i needed. The apartment is cute, cosy and nicely furbished.There were plenty of bath towels. Its near everything; grocery store, deli store buses and train. It is really really easy to get there and to move around manhattan. He also sent me ton of information right after I completed the booking!
If I had any questions, he was quick to respond by email or phone. He also was a great resource for happenings to try out in the area.
I will definitely return. Thanks Gregorio

Thanks a lot to Gregorio, to stay with him was like to be at home, feel free. We had to spend 2 days inside because of hurricane Irene, so we were together in one flat and Gregorio kindly told us everything we needed to know, give us all support. We enjoyed the stay in New York and have a good hinterland at a nice comfortable room at Gregorio.  Also we enjoyed the district Gregorio lives with full of life, good chinese and mexican food, not faraway from Manhattan via subway. Jarka and Vera

Gregorio was a great host!  His place is in a nice location, and it seemed there was a lot to do in the neighborhood.  He was very helpful with giving me directions, suggestions for things to do, and made my stay very comfortable.  He is easy to talk with and made my stay very comfortable.

We had a great haven at Gregorio's place whilest staying in NYC. The appartment is in a quiet neighboorhood north of Harlem, with several subway stations nearby (3min. walk).
Gregorio's attitude towards us was very talkative, open and sharing. We had a good laugh as he was always willing to share experiences and give us extra info about restaurants etc..
When we go back (10 days NYC apparently isn't enough ;-), we'll certainly drop by or stay with him again!!
The host canceled my reservation the day before arrival.

Gregorio is a lovely host. It is nice to chat with him and he is very kind.
The room is confortable and well equipped with everything you need.
It is not so close to downtown, but it is well connected and gives the possibility to explore part of the City you would not see otherwise.
Greg is a nice guy and a great host. His place is clean, comfortable and very close to downtown. Definitely recommend his place.
Our stay was amazing!!! Great host, cute apartment, excellent location.  We will definitely go back and stay with Gregorio.

Unfortunately we didn't meet with Greg. But he was in touch via cell phone, There was no any problem!
Apartaments was very comfortable. Several subway stations around. From 7 to 3 minutes to go.
About 15 minutes to Manhatten by subway. But it was OK.
Definitely recommended place to stay in NYC !

Gregorio was a great host.  The room was very neat and well decorated.  It was very easy to get around Manhattan from this uptown location.  I also felt safe walking around both in the day and night time.  A great option for those who want to stay in a quieter, yet still convenient location.  Thanks!
An excellent room in a good location that is close to the express train. Enjoyed meeting Gregorio and really enjoyed the stay!

The stay at Gregorio's place was great. He is a kind, not bothering and resourceful host. The room has air conditioning and is spacious. The apartment is pretty well situated - an express subway line which goes directly downtown is a couple of blocks away (5 min. walk and a 20 min. ride to downtown). I gladly recommend Gregorio, he was great to chat to and gave us great tips. He was not at all overwhelming, left us our space and the overall stay was easy & efficient.
Thank you Gregorio, it felt nice coming back these 3 past nights to your cozy room with the beautiful painting!!!
All the best,
V & C
Gregorio was great and communicated everything I needed to know in order to have a nice stay.  Everything was perfect...Thanks again!

La ubicación del apartamento es buena. A 20 minutos en metro de las principales atracciones de NY. El trato con Gregorio y la comunicación muy buenos también.
La habitación es muy grande, con una televisión de 42 pulgadas. Soleada y bonita.
Lo recomendaria.

The room was clean just as shown on the pictures. The apartment is a little older, but for the price it was great! We didn't spend much time in the apartment. We just used it to sleep in. We briefly met Gregorio, but he seems like a great person. He communicated with us via text messaging and email promptly. If you are looking for a comfortable and affordable place to just sleep at, I would recommend this apartment.

We had a great time in NY, Gregori went beyond to guide us around, given lots of information which were very helpful, resuming: Regarding to the host, “”we went as guests and we left Gregori’s place as friends””, Regarding to the property, location and facilities, the location area being Up North Manhattan but very easy and quick to commute to downtown Manhattan, the facilities on the place all are accordantly to the price.  We recommend Gregori's place and we when return to NY will search for his place again.
Gregorio was a gracious host!

Gregorio's home was a wonderful place to retire each night when I got home after gallavanting the town. He is neat and tidy and there's loads of privacy as he leaves for work early at 830am. Love his friendly dog. Equipped with a nice kitchen with a fridge and a stove, I could prepare some breakfast before I leave for the day. Shower, bath and toilet all working. Spacious bedroom equipped with heater and aircon. And Gregorio is warm, sincere and helpful. 25 minutes from 42 street by A train. Convenient. About 8 mins from his apt to train station. I had a great time. Thanks Gregorio!
Gregorio has been helpful when I am planning my trip. He has given me enough time to look for alternative accommodation when the booking unfortunately cannot be executed. Thanks and regards, Anthony

Recomiendo la estadía en la casa de Gregorio ampliamente.El apartamento es muy lindo y agradable. La habitación es muy confortable y limpia ( al igual que el resto del apartamento). La ubicación es excelente, cerca del metro (2 cuadras), se puede caminar por la zona tranquilamente a cualquier hora ( en dos oportunidades regresamos a las 2 am. caminando del metro al apartamento), el bus pasa por la calle del frente, hay supermercado muy cerca y donde comer. En 20min estas en el  centro de la ciudad y en metro te mueves perfecto desde ese punto. Ademas los tips que nos dio Gregorio,nos ayudo a ahorrar un poco de dinero!!!  Es un excelente anfitrión!!!  Mi esposo y yo volveremos a NY y definitivamente nos quedaremos nuevamente en su casa!!
Gregorio's room that's exactly how it looks in the picture. It's a very cultural neighborhood. It's near a supermarket and restaurants. The train isn't very far.

Amazing!!! In the words of a great host, Gregorio himself.
He is absolutely remarkable. From the first day he was more than willing to help me out with anything.
His place is in a cool neighborhood with easy access to midtown manhattan (app. 15 min). Gregorio has a very nice and clean apartment and you get much more than what you pay for :) He is very outgoing and up for anything, like comedy clubs, dance clubs, bars etc.
I definitely recommend staying at his place!! Thanks G!!

I only met Gregorio very briefly, but we communicated through email and he was very prompt to answer. The room is exactly like the picture, the neighbourhood is indeed nice and quiet, and the walk to the subway is quick and easy. We had a very pleasant experience.

Mariano and I felt very welcomed at Gregorio's place. The room was clean, organized, and very comfortable. The bathroom was also neat. It couldn't be better! His neighborhood was nice and cute and we always felt safe walking from/to the metro which was just a few steps away. Gregorio was extremely helpful in giving us directions and good advice about places where to eat and hang out. He gave us excellent tips! He was very responsive to our needs although we were texting him in the middle of his work day!
Muchísimas gracias por todo Gregorio! Eres bienvenido a Tampa cuando quieras :)
Koillor y Mariano
Gregorio's place was just as advertised. It was close to the subways, clean, and spacious. Gregorio was a great host. We recommend his place very highly.
it was a nice stay . the only point could  be improved is the cleaning .

Staying at Gregorio's was a great experience, it was a nice apartment, and for two girls we felt safe in the area. We felt welcome in the apartment, the subway and many buses were close by. There is also a paid parking beside the apartment which was convenient for us as we drove to NYC. Would stay again!

Gregorio is a great host. The room is exactly like the picture, its cozy clean, and organized. The neighbourhood is quiet, and the walk to the subway is quick and easy, only take 25-30 mins one way to Time Square, 42nd st . The host is very helpful for directions that I asked. I recommend to stay at his apartment.

Great room in a quaint apartment in Washington Heights that is convenient to both A and 1 metro lines. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and Gregorio is a super friendly, well-traveled man (whom I unfortunately didn't get to interact with too much because he's always SO BUSY! =P). I really enjoyed the neighborhood, actually. It's a predominantly Latino community, which means cheap Dominican/Mexican/Salvadorian delivery and take-out pretty much anyyyyyy time of the day, which I was VERY okay with! Also, cheap groceries in the bodegas on St. Nicholas St! There is also a sprinkling of newer, hipster bars and cafes in the neighborhood. A few blocks east, and you have Yeshiva University, so there are plenty of kosher delis and the BEST SCHWARMA PLACE (Golam Heights)!

Overall, Gregorio's apartment was perfect for my needs. I spent a full month here while doing a visiting clerkship at St. Luke's Roosevelt Hospital....it was an easy, fast commute to work, and there are plenty of cheap food options in the area for those weekend study sessions. :)

Gregorio's place was great. Since we were driving in from Ohio, it was fantastic that we could get access to the apartment even before we were able to meet him personally. The room was a very nice size for my wife and I and close enough to the subway (the 1 train) to make it just as convenient to our daughter in the UWS.

We found a parking lot (paid!) just around the corner where we could leave our car from Sunday evening to Tuesday morning and not worry about street-cleaning schedules.

We were pleased to find that his taste in art is very similar to our own and that Gregorio was actually the artist responsible for a few pieces.

We'll definitely be checking availability the next time we visit NYC.

Muchas gracias por todo Gregorio !!
Si estáis buscando un apartamento en New York, paren de buscar, sin duda esta es la mejor opción, amplia habitación, cocina y baño.
Solo a 5 minutos de la parada de metro numero 1, que te lleva directo a Times Square en menos de 30 minutos y a solo dos calles de la casa tenéis una calle llena de sitios para comer, pizza slice por un dolar, el mejor pollo, tacos, comida china ...
Gregorio es un gran tipo, simpatico, amable y conoce muy bien New York, así que eso que os ahorráis en guía turístico :)
Así que lo dicho una gran experiencia, un gran anfitrión, un buen lugar y encima nos vamos con un nuevo amigo en la gran city!!!
Sin duda repetiremos.
Gracias Gregorio...

Gregorio is an amazing guy. He gives you your privacy and is respectful, but will engage in meaningful conversation if you're up for it.
The room is exactly as depicted and quite large. I had an issue with the chandelier not working all the time, and Gregorio went out and replaced it promptly. As a side note, you will just have the one room and there is no common living room area. The kitchenette is tiny but you'll have space in the fridge, cupboards, and it works fine for light cooking. The bathroom is Great! Waterfall style shower head with hot water and amazing pressure. Again, although the bathroom is not big, there will be ample space to store your toiletries inside the ergonomic space.
The area is nice and safe in a good part of Washington Heights. Deli and el salvadorian place downstairs are great and other good restaurants around... Gregorio will tell you everything you need to know
Overall i can recommend this place to any traveller. I was there for 6 weeks while I did a medical rotation at one of the hospitals in the Bronx... It was perfect.
Cheers!

Gregorio is a nice person, but we did need some intervention with airbnb. I stayed at his place for the month of April, until my apartment was ready for a May move-in date. The first week was a bit challenging. It seems the drains have been neglected for a while, and neither the bathroom sink or the tubs drained properly. Also, the building is an older building, so certain plumbing fixtures are retrofitted. One issue is the claw bathtub having a retrofitted shower. The main shower head is over seven feet from the base of the tub. There is a hand held shower head that is at a user-friendly height. But the switch lever is on the main shower head, and that cannot be reached by the average person. I'm tall, I stand at 5'9", and I could not reach the shower head. Gregorio is much taller than me, so it is not an issue for him. The main shower head has no angle. It deluges water in a straight down fashion, which doesn't help much for a female trying to take a proper shower. Especially when the tub is filling with filthy water because it does not drain. My point was well taken by the Airbnb representative, because this is a health code violation. The landlord is exempt because the head held shower held is provided, but if the host refuses to accommodate his guest, then it is a different story. Gregorio said he would leave the hand held shower head activated for me, but failed to do so several times. I was only able to take a shower three times in the first 12 days of staying there. That presented a terrible inconvenience because I was in school six days each week, and we work in an intensive environment and sweat a lot. I had to find alternative places to shower several times, and certain days, I was unable to do so. I was not happy. Gregorio's responses were rather flippant when I texted him to ask how we could rectify the problem. The messages were forwarded to Airbnb, because I needed to show that I made an attempt to have the host fix the problem first. Once Airbnb intervened (almost halfway through the stay), the problem was solved. The remainder of the stay was uneventful. I don't really know Gregorio. My boyfriend and I met him prior to my reservation, and I saw him occasionally in the apartment. He worked during the day, and I had school in the evening, so we would see each other on weekends and when I would return from school, before he went to bed. In fact, there were two trips I made for five days each (one was the Easter weekend). Some we saw each other minimally. Our face to face interactions were always pleasant, but he obviously didn't really feel he needed to accommodate my needs. Other than that, the bathroom is kind of messy with short bits of hair...

The room is large, airy, bright, clean and very tastefully decorated.
The apartment building and area is very safe.
The location is brilliant.
Gregorio is a most wonderful host. He is sensitive and understands the finesse of being warm and very helpful while at the same time letting his guest get on with what they need to do.
He gave me advice on galleries, and his advice was the highlight of my trip.
He is always ready to please, always ready for great conversations and always ready with seriously most delicious coffee.
In short, highly recommended!

We spent very little time at Gregorio's due to our son being hospitalized, however Gregorio was very hospitable to us.  He had to get up very early for work and we never heard a peep.  For anyone needing to be close to Columbia Presbyterian Hospital, we found Gregorio's to be very convenient.

Gregorio was a warm, welcoming and helpful host. Always in for a nice chat and ready to provide tips/ recommendations where needed.. from transportation, to free museum days and nightlife and cooking lessons :) enjoyed my stay at his place to the max. The room was nice and cozy, just as portrayed on the AirBnB site. WiFi/ AC and all other ammenities were working properly. As a single female traveller I felt safe travelling around the area/neighboorhood even when returning late at night. There are plenty of nice latin restaurants in the area and supermarket is located in front of the appartment complex. Would definately stay at Gregorio's place again on a future trip!

Gregorio was an excellent host and was very easy to deal with. He is an awesome guy and responds emails very fast. He was also very helpful with little things like hooking up data plans for my phone and tips for travel around the city.

Gregorio was very accommodating and an exceptional host! I had a wonderful time at his place. I highly recommend it. The location was ideal, bust stop across the street, subway station a couple of blocks away and a supermarket across the street. The building is quiet and clean. The apartment was neat and I enjoyed the decor, the artwork and of course the room size! Great experience, fantastic host and unbeatable value for the price! You cannot go wrong with Gregorio!

Gregorio is warm and nice person. I stayed his place for 3 nights. He was a extremely busy so I just saw him once at the very first time.
The place was clean, neat, and clean. Bed cloths are were very clean and neat especially odorless. Room size was just perfect for me and my wife. TV was brand new and big but I didn't watch many times. Bathrooms was clean and neat as well. Kitchen was just very fine to do a light cook. He prepared coffee for us. Also, the apartments are so calm no body makes any noise. The place is very safe because police station is near. Small grocery store is just at fist floor and bigger one is just a cross street. You might want to go to 181st station other than 19xth station because you take very uphill road by walk. It only take 20 minutes from 181st station to Time Square Station by Line A ( I checked it by my cell phone) By the way, this place is just perfect fit for you maybe. It is just great and perfect. Five stars + Five diamonds. Thanks Greg.
Looks just like the picture.  The room was clean and neat.  We found parking at a nearby garage.  Overall I would recommend this room to anyone.

Gregorio is very respectefull and welcome.
He's place is just like the photos and near from train station.
He's a very good person.
La Cabana is cheap and yum restaurant in the bulding.
Thanks to having us with big smile all the time.

Gregorio was G R E A T! He greeted me and my boyfriend, gave us a quick tour, a few recommendations for food in the area, handed over the keys and let us get to our New York excursion.  His place is in a very safe neighborhood. Me and my boyfriend walked from the subway as late as 2:00 am and didn't feel unsafe at all. There is immediate access to transit which made getting back and forth from the city a breeze.The place was decorated beautifully and the room looked exactly like the pictures. Everything was clean and there were no odors. The only thing I would recommend would be to put a mirror in the guest room. I fell like I could have hogged the bathroom less if I had a mirror in the room to get ready. Over all it was great and I will be coming back and staying with Gregorio if he'll have me. :-) Thanks again!

Gregorio was a great host even though I only saw him once.  The apartment is clean, the room is as described and pictured however the bed seemed smaller than I expected.  It would have been cozy if my spouse had also joined me but as a single it was fine.  Gregorio made coffee available in the morning which was a treat for me.  Access to the A train is very simple and the 1 is within walking distance as well.  Overall I would recommend this room to others needing space in Manhattan.

Gregorio was a great host, gave complete privacy and he's a friendly person   . Apartmen is very nice too, safe neighborhood, easy access to subway station, the place was decorated beautifully and the room looked exactly like the pictures. Our entertainment was amazing.

J'ai passé 12 jours chez Gregorio et c'était très agréable. Certes nous n'avions pas les même horaires mais nous avons pu nous croiser et échanger sur la ville, sur Paris, sur l'art et bien d'autre choses... C'est une personne accueillante, souriante et intéressante.
La chambre, quant à elle est grande et très agréable avec un grand placard pour s'étaler. Vous avez accès à la salle de bain et à la cuisine, pouvez rentrer quand vous le voulez (en étant respectueux du sommeil de l'autre il va s'en dire), un supermarché de l'autre côté de la rue et que vous connaissiez NYC ou non de chez lui il est très simple de se déplacer avec la ligne A.
C'est une bonne adresse, n'hésiter pas ?

***********************************************************************
I spent 12 days in his place and it was really nice. We did'nt have the same schedule but we could cross us and discuss about the city, Paris, art and many other things ... He is a friendly, smiling and interesting person.
The room, is large and very nice with a large closet to spread out. You have access to the bathroom and the kitchen everything is nice and clean. You can go whenever you want (being respectful of the other sleep), a supermarket across the street and you know or not NYC it is very easy to move with line A.
This is a good place, do not hesitate !

After searching for almost two weeks one place to spend the Christmas and the New Year’s Eve, My boyfriend and I decided to stay on Gregorio’s apartment. I got to tell you all, we could not have chosen a better place to stay!!! Since the first moment we got there we found it lovely and very comfortable. The place is exactly as the pictures show. The bedroom is big and fits two persons perfectly. The bathroom itself is nice and clean so you can take pleasantly bath. Also, Gregorio made room in the kitchen for us, so we could store food in the refrigerator, freezer and cupboard. There is a nice restaurant just below the apartment and a supermarket across the street. In addition, there are two subways near the apartment, A and 1. They both take almost 30 minutes to get to Times Square. Now, about Gregorio! We were so happy to meet him!! He is an amazing person, very gentleman. We could spend hours chatting! My boyfriend had an issue with his flight and we could not get in time there, but Gregorio was patient and waited for us with no problem. Also, Gregorio provided us towels and soap to have shower, as well as, coffee to have breakfast. We tried one of his wines and it was one of the best ones we’ve ever tried! Every time that we had some doubts we texted him and immediately he replied to us. Gregorio knows a lot of Manhattan and its surroundings! He gave us very nice tips of places and restaurants to visit! This experience was one of the best that we had and we definitely recommend Gregorio’s apartment to stay!!!

We were delighted to find Gregorio's place located just one block from where our daughter lives. The neighborhood is an unusual mix of Dominican and Jewish, and it feels very safe. The apartment itself is a typically small NYC apartment and the room is exactly as shown. You share a bathroom with the host. His place is very tidy and clean with some kitsch-- touches like a small chandelier in the bathroom :-). We didn't need much guidance from him, but Gregorio is a warm and kind person whom I trust would have helped us if we needed advice.

Gregorio is a great host. He helped me out with some additional heating. Provided lots of towels & linen.
Gave me a power adapter to use while I was there. Great apartment to stay at.
The Internet was unfortunately a little slow (3G speeds).
Also, keep in mind that it'll take you about an hour to get to midtown/ lower Manhattan.
Overall, an excellent spot.

Si queréis ir a New York y no sabéis donde, este es vuestro sitio. Gregorio es un anfitrión excelente, atento, educado, muy respetuoso con la privacidad y no duda en darte cualquier consejo sobre la ciudad, los cuales son muy útiles por cierto!
La habitación es tal y como se ve, limpia, bonita, y con una cama muy cómoda. Ademas el barrio aunque parezca que está lejos es muy tranquilo y seguro, y con la parada de metro que se encuentra a 5 min andando, se llega al centro de midtown en menos de 30 min.
Era nuestra primera experiencia con Airbnb y ha sido 100% recomendable. Repetiría sin duda!
Muchas gracias por la estancia Gregorio!

De kamer bij Gregorio voldeed aan de beschrijving en de foto's. Gregorio zelf was de 9 dagen dat wij in zijn woning verbleven maar 1 nacht aanwezig en daarna zelf ook op vakantie. Hij is aardig, stond voor ons klaar met uitleg en de sleutels en had schoon linnengoed voor ons klaarliggen. De buurt is een interessante mengeling van culturen en inkomens en je kunt een paar blokken verderop (amper 10 minuten wandelen) veel verschillende eetgelegenheden vinden. Binnen een half uur sta je met de metro op Times Square. Chinatown/Little Italy en Brooklyn duren uiteraard langer, maar wij hebben dat nooit als probleem ervaren, want de verbindingen zijn helder. Wij vinden de plek een aanrader.
It was great! Room was nice, Gregorio is super friendly, and I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

(English version below) Moro nos EUA há um ano e recebi a visita da minha mãe vindo diretamente do Brasil para NY. Apesar de o apartamento ser localizado bem longe do aeroporto (45 min - 1h de metro), fica bem próximo à linha vermelha do metrô pela qual pode-se ter acesso à toda manhattam e bairros ao redor. Gregório foi um ótimo anfitrião e a vizinhança possui diversos supermercados, lojas, restaurantes, salões e etc. Recomendo bastante para pessoas que queiram um quarto individual com o privacidade e conforto.
Somos gratos pela hospitalidade, Gregório!
I have been living in the US for 1 year and my mother came from Brazil to New York. Even tough the apartment is located far away from the airport (about 45min - 1 hour by subway) it is located very close to the red subway line, from which you can have acess to any place in manhattam. Gregorio was a great host and there are many supermarkets, shops and everything you may need in the neighborhood. I highly recomend Gregorio's apartment for anyone who wants some privacy and confort for a very good price.
Thank you for hosting us, Gregorio!

Gregorio was an excellent host! We didn't run into each other much (my husband and I were out and about a lot), but he was very friendly when we spoke. Neighborhood was quiet and close to a subway stop. Not a lot to see and do directly around the apartment that we saw, but it doesn't take too long to get somewhere with restaurants. Room and apartment were very clean and cozy. Lovely room!

When we arrived to NYC Gregorio immediately met us near downtown to give us the key and welcome us to the city. We chatted for a few minutes and we immediately felt a great, positive vibe from him. When we made it to the apartment we were pleased to find a cool, trendy, artistic space with a spacious bedroom ready for us. The closet was empty and had a few hangers for our use. It was alas spacious enough for us to hide our luggage.

The description of the room was perfectly accurate. The neiborhood was always quiet and felt safe, even at night when we would return to our room.

We had little interaction with Gregorio because we were out and about from morning until night everyday. But, on our last day we were fortunate enough to spend about an hour with him before we checked out. He made us a delicious cup of coffee and we discussed our trip and our mutual interest in the arts. We will definitely remain in touch with Gregorio and try to stay with him on our next NYC trip.

Gregorio was an awesome host! His place was very clean and a nice location. He was real helpful with giving me  suggestions for things to do, and my stay was very comfortable. He was  easy to talk with and made my stay great.I definitely plan on staying there next time in New York
Super clean place. Excellent host

I was made to feel very comfortable from the moment I arrived until my departure. Gregorio greeted me at 11pm and I was left to enjoy the quietness of the apartment for the next couple of day's. His coffee making was fabulous & the times we were together for conversation were great.

This apartment worked perfectly for my needs. The space was clean and not far from a subway, so it was pretty easy to get into the heart of the city. Gregorio was friendly and though we didn't see him that much, he seemed like a really nice guy.

Gregario was an incredibly warm, friendly and welcoming host. The place tastefully decorated, clean, nice and convenient. The room and apartment are impeccably maintained. Gregario was thoughtful with every detail and always willing to help. The neighborhood is really vibrant and is close to parks, trains and a rich variety of ethnic restaurants. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would love to return.

Surrounding traffic is convenient, 5 minutes walk from the subway. The house is comfortable and the matching conditions are well, including the kitchen, bathroom, hot water.
By the way,Gregorio is a pretty nice guy

I arrived very late from an international flight and Gregorio kindly waited up to show me the room and hand me my own set of keys. The location is perfect, only two blocks from the metro and with many shops, laundromats and restaurants in the vicinity. The room is big and comfortable with laid back Art Deco decor.

Gregorio is very friendly and personable. He loves New York and gave us recommendations on what to do in the city. The room is spacious, comfortable, and exactly as pictured and described. We didn't use the TV, but it was a nice feature. Check in and out were really easy. Overall, my boyfriend and I were really happy with this listing! The apartment is pretty far north, so the commute to midtown Manhattan (where we spent a lot of our time) was pretty much the only drawback, but we were close to subway stops. We also didn't come back to the apartment during the day, so it wasn't really that bad at all.

Gregorio is a great host! He is very accommodating and easy going. His place was neat, clean and the room was better than we expected.

I wanted to get Latin food, so the neighborhood was perfect for us. It is a short hop from Central Park/Times Square (20-30 minutes) and the subway is easily accessible (multiple stations).

We had a great time and I would highly recommend Gregorio.
Gregorio is a gracious host that makes you feel at home.  He is welcoming, attentive, and considerate. I would strongly recommend staying with him and look forward to my next visit to NYC.

Todo genial!! Gregory es un muy buen propietario muy entregado a todo!! Nos sentimos en todo momento en casa y la verdad es que te ayuda en todo lo que puede más!! Sin duda volveremos y repetiremos con el!! No lo dudéis ni un momento, relación calidad precio esta genial y solo  a 20 min del centro con el metro exprés!! Un lujo todo!!
房东greg大叔人如其名，非常谦和，这个房源在第189街，距离181街的地铁有两个街区（从185街出来）。整个房子的装修古朴典雅，床非常舒服。短暂的三天居住的时间里面greg大叔跟我讲了很多这个街区的历史和故事，有机会和他做朋友是我的荣幸。谢谢greg大叔的招待，希望下次回到纽约的时候，还有机会居住。

Gregorio is a great host. He made me feel very welcome. Even though he would not be there when I left, it was very easy to leave the key and lock up the apartment. The apartment is very conveniently located since I came to New York to visit with my brother who lives 2 blocks away. There is a supermarket just across the street. The room is large and clean and comfortable and was exactly as described. Thanks Gregorio.

Gregorio is a gracious host who welcomed us despite the lateness in our arrival and our last minute booking. He provided us with a warm welcome in his clean home. He had even ensured to put on the air conditioning in the room to ensure that we would not be too hot upon our arrival. He also provided us with bath products just like hotel rooms. The bedroom is exactly as listed, with clean sheets and comfortable mattress and pillows. He made excellent suggestions about places to go eat in the neighborhood and also allowed us to use the kitchen and fridge for any food we may have purchased. Moreover, his home is located a short walk (at the most, 7 minutes at a very slow leisurely pace) from the metro station. I would definitely recommended this host and home to anyone wanting to experience New York for the first time. Thank you again, Gregorio, for opening your home to us.

I could not have been happier with my stay! I had housing plans fall through at the last minute, and Gregorio was quick to respond and very easy to work with. The room was beautiful and clean, my need were anticipated, and the whole process was so easy. Exactly what I needed!

Fue muy amable con nosotros, cuando necesitamos ayuda el supo dar la ayuda necesaria, el barrio es muy tranquilo y se encuentra de todo, cerca del metro para poder movilizarse.

el cuarto muy limpio con todas las comodidades, el departamento muy acogedor y limpio también, el departamento es muy completo.

this was absolutely my best experience with airnb hosts by far!!! Gregorio, really had a top notch place with all amenities as described nothing was left forgotten and the place was full of great details that made me feel at home or even better than home. thanks Gregorio for letting me be in your place.
Gregorio was always very helpful and the room was excellent. The place was very convenient.  We strongly recommend.

I had a great three night stay at Gregorio's lovely home. Was spacious, comfortable, and in a safe neighbourhood. Very good price for a huge room near the centre of NYC. Was a little further out than I would've liked, but still a decent, easy subway trip to the city. Took, give or take, around 35-40 mins to get to Times Square. Felt safe in the area and Gregorio (though we barely even met!) was always close by if I needed and was gracious in giving me my space. Thanks for having me in your home!

I loved staying at Gregorio's place! The apartment was clean, organized, and very welcoming. He was helpful and gave us our space when we needed it, but always responded quickly if I had any questions. It's a bit of train ride to midtown Manhattan, but it wasn't bad at all. Just keep that in mind if you're making lots of plans in Manhattan/Brooklyn. Definitely recommend Gregorio's place if you're looking to visit NYC :)
The room is so nice and clean,  the cozy room definitely made the trip perfect.  gregorio was very nice and respond quickly to any request.

For a business traveler on a tight budget, this private room was an excellent value and very convenient to my meetings on the upper West Side.  Everything was clean, bright and beautifully decorated, exactly as advertised. Gregorio was the perfect host; he accommodated my unusual schedule and gave excellent recommendations about where to to park, shop and get a late night bite to eat. I would gladly return on future business or leisure trips.
Es la persona mas silenciosa que he podido ver, impresionante.
Gregorio was very nice and friendly.

Gregorio is a really nice guy, and very friendly and hospitable.  We had several very nice talks.  The room was very spacious, clean, and comfortable.  It was heated just right - not too hot, not too cold.  Nice window, facing east, so it gets the morning sun.  The bed was comfortable.  There was a couch and a couple of chairs in the room and also a little one-person folding table to set food on or a laptop or tablet.    The kitchen and bathroom were pretty small, but that's NYC - space is at a premium.  Getting in and out of the apartment building was easy.  The TV has broadcast channels only, but there's Roku, which gets Youtube, Hulu, and a bunch of other content.  It's a nice part of NYC - very safe neighborhood, not too crowded, lots of cafes and restaurants nearby, and also the Fort Tryon park and The Cloisters with a branch of the Metropolitan Museum of Art.

We had a great two day stay at Gregorio's place. We had a short turn-around time, needing to find something quickly because another host cancelled on us at the last minute. We were very lucky to find Gregorio's place.
Response time once I contacted him was super quick and the booking process easy. We had all the information we needed to get into the apartment and access wifi. No surprises. Although we didn't have a chance to meet in person, Gregorio checked in with us every day via text to make sure everything was going smoothly.
The apartment was perfect for us. Uptown, so pretty quiet and safe, but easily accessible by subway, the apartment is exactly as described. The bedroom is huge! Comfy bed, nicely decorated and very clean!
We would definitely stay with Gregorio again when we come back to NYC.
Gregorio was a great host. His place is clean and quiet and spacious! I would stay here again.

This was a great cozy apartment with pretty much everything you need for your stay in NYC.
Gregorio was very helpful and communicative.
I would definitely stay here again!
Love the location, and Gregorio is so friendly and helpful.

The house is clean, bedroom large , TV And net flix , Wi-Fi litte slow, 5 min walking from de Subway, 25 min tô get tô the 42 street , and 15 min to the central Park , à lots of restaurants, market and a Duking dunuts Just in front of the dor . Good price, VGreg is a Nice person as well
The room is as spacious and comfortable as its shown in the listing photos.  The host is kind, quiet yet friendly.  I enjoyed my stay and do recommend this rental.

The apartment is very nice! I reached it easy from JFK by Subway. Good quite and safe area is a plus as well! I liked the room and all building, clean and safe, and supermarket is not fare from apartment. Greg is very nice and opened person, thanks him for his hospitality and nice comfortable room. If you ask should I recommend it my friends and family, I say yes.
Greg was welcoming, and kind. It was a quiet stay in his apt. And it felt cozy, and comfortable. I would def. recommend, and return.

O quarto do Greg, é super espaçoso e limpo.O apartamento é pequeno mas se tem tudo o que é necessário.Minha única restrição é quanto a localização.Achei o local um pouco deserto para retornar de programações noturnas, mas é bem servido pela linha expressa do metrô e apesar de distante do centro, leva apenas 20 minutos para estar em Times Square.
Greg é um excelente rapaz mas só estive em sua companhia por 3 dias.Mesmo assim me atendeu todas as solicitações.Obrigada Greg.
Always a great stay with Greg! I will definitely stay here again.
Very, very, very nice!
This an awesome place where we spent an espectacular time. Greg is a very good host and his place its as described it. We recommend it.

Todo lo que diga siempre sera positivo, desde que es muy limpio, una cama comoda para descansar y se agradece el aire aire acondicionado en buen estado, ademas metro cerca, autobus abajo del edificio, supermercado en frente, la verdad todo impecable

This was a great location if you don't want to be located in the heart of the hustle. Washington Heights is a very diverse area which I happened to love and very close to subway entrances. Being new to the city myself, the subway routes to the city were very simple from this location with the exception of a few nights on the weekends when they were doing work on tracks. Just ask the locals, everyone was very helpful!
Greg, is a very nice host. The room is a nice room, queen sized bed, couch, sitting chair, television and a/c. I came and went as I pleased and felt very comfortable throughout my stay, after 13 days it felt like home. I would definitely consider staying at his apartment again if I make it back to the city.

It looks exactly like the pictures. The bed is comfortable and the host is nice, polite, timely and an all around good guy!  If you need a place in northern Manhattan, please dont book it when I'm intown!  I'll book this place again and again.
We feel free and comfortable. Mr. Greg is a nice man.

Clean. Kind. Communicates.
I was pleased that Greg responded to any question I had. He was a gracious host and had clean towels laid on the bed for us when we arrived. He had a good balance of being available yet not intruding on our time alone. My husband and I merely needed a place to sleep as we explored the city.
This apartment is at the northern end of Manhattan and it takes awhile to get to and from downtown. He is not far from historic Fort Washington.
Take the A train express rather than the 1. Less stops.

alloggio come da foto. la camera è spaziosa e confortevole. la cucina a disposizione degli ospiti è ben attrezzata e gli  elettrodomestici sono perfettamente funzionanti. Greg è una persona gentile, disponibile, premurosa e discreta. tutte le attrazioni di Manhattan sono facilmente raggiungibili utilizzando la linea A - EXPRESS che passa vicino alla casa.

Greg's cozy apartment was colorful, comfortable and convenient. He couldn't have been nicer or more accommodating. The location was perfect for our one week stay. Very grateful for the elevator! We'd recommend Greg's place and would stay here again. Thanks Greg!

Greg was a wonderful host. He allowed us to drop off our bags early and leave alittle later for our bus. He also was super friendly upon meeting him and very sweet. The apartment is perfectly located. It’s only about 30-45 min ride all the way down to 35 street. The neighborhood is pretty safe and quaint. Greg has beautiful taste in art which he shows all over his apartment.
H

We had a fantastic stay! Greg is a great host. He was really helpful and left us to our own privacy but was also very friendly when we did see him. The room is a great size and nice and cosy! The apartment is in a nice quiet area and very close to subway. Took around 30minutes to travel to central Manhattan. Would definitely recommend for somewhere a little quieter but easy to get to the busy city! :)

Greg is an awesome host. The apartment is centrally located in Washington Heights and the room is extremely comfortable. Everything was clean and Greg was extremely helpful and respectful. Definitely would stay here again.
Such a trendy apartment with colors of all sorts! Loved our stay here! If you’re wanting an escape from the loud city, definitely chose Greg’s spot!
O Greg é melhor anfitrião que se poderia ter, nos deu varias dicas e foi super atencioso, recomendo totalmente, espero ficar hospedado lá de novo!!
Greg is a great host. Welcoming, flexible and quiet.

The second time I stayed at Greg’s. Everything is as perfect as last time. While Greg’s absence, he kept on messaging me to check if everything is alright. Highly recommended, and definitely will come back.

Greg fue muy amable con nosotros y muy discreto. Cuando tuvimos que hablar con Greg fue muy simpático y cordial.
Muchas gracias.
it was quiet, close to the subway, clean, and convenient. Perfect for our stay!
Todo bien

Giorgio's place is great if you're mobile and are not traveling with children. The walk to the subway is uphill and the location is quite far from all the tourist areas like times square, etc. I stayed here for a work trip so it worked well for me. The price is amazing for a week in NY. The room is spacious although the bathroom could have been cleaner. Giorgio is very nice and the neighborhood is quiet.
very cute room in this cozy little apartment with supermarket and subway station nearby. Greg is a great and uncomplicated host, who gives you a lot of privacy and makes sure you feel right at home!
Super accueil je vous recommande Giorgio pour sa gentillesse, un excellent appartement bien situé pour profiter pleinement de votre séjour à new York !
Really great host and place. I enjoyed my stay there. 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a nice, quiet and clean room in Washington Heights. TV, AC, sofa everything in the room.
Highly recommended. The place is exactly as you see it in the pictures. A couple of blocks away from 191st subway station. Giorgio was very helpful and nice. The room is quite big and private.
Your place is awesome !
Good location , nice host , clean
the room just like you see in the pic
The room was clean and exactly what was promised. Good value. I did not get to meet my host, but he always responded quickly to questions.
accesible en aspectos importantes.
Justo lo necesario para tener un buen viaje.

Giorgio is very concerned about leaving the guests well.
Always very solicitous and at the same time respecting privacy.
The apartment is well located, with supermarket, convenience stores and metro very close.
I highly recommend this accommodation.
Room was just as advertised. Host was nice and communicated promptly. I’d stay w him again.
as always, my stay was fantastic! thanks for being a great host!

This is a great place, with plenty of space and extra pillows on the bed. I was surprised how quiet the location was despite being just off Broadway. The heating in the winter when I stayed was just right and nearly inaudible. Giorgio was also very hospitable despite my late arrival and was able to let me in even after 12 AM.

Nice “old school” New York building, and the location was perfect for my needs.  For this area, it is quiet... so sleep is easy.  If you like early morning sun in your window, this room will do it for you.  Giorgio made sure I was able to check in and provided a key to the building.  He communicates very well, so you’ll have no worries.  A very good basic place to stay.  Thanks Giorgio!
Great host
Giorgio place is fantastic, the room is bright and really big with locals of space! I would highly recommend Giorgio's place to stay and I would stay again

Lo mejor de todos, una gran atención, y una gran persona, me sentí que estaba en un hotel de 6 Estrellas 🌟 muy limpio todos, sin duda volvería. La Habitacion, cocina, baño todos perfecto 👌 con todas esta atención no hay que pagar tanto dineros en un hotel..

El cuarto está bastante bien. Lo necesario para pasar unas noches.
Recomiendo confimar con el anfitrión si la reservación entró por fast Booking o algo así. Una semana antes me.contactó y me dijo que tenía dos reservas al mismo tiempo y debía cancelar la mía. Al final la respetó pero para evitar algo así, desde un principio confirmen. La zona está cerca de 2 estaciones de metro. Sugiero regresar no tan tarde en la ncohe. Una noche no hubo agua caliente pero el resto todo ok.
Reasonably priced, with a convenient location near line 1 and A subway stations.
Exactly as advertised. Clean, bright room!

Giorgio's place is the best place to stay in Manhattan. It's super clean, comfortable and in a very good neighborhood, very calm and safe.
He is a great host and his place is very stylish with a lot of amenities. I recommend everyone staying at Giorgio's for a wonderful experience.
Giorgio is a great host. His place is very clean, spacious, and stylish. The neighborhood is safe and guests can take a short walk to subway stations (1 and A). Highly recommended!
Très bon séjour ! Métro proche, parfait pour rejoindre le centre-ville.
He’s very friendly and a good host.
Super Airbnb ! Le quartier est très calme, il y a une supérette en face et le métro est à 5 minutes à pied avec une ligne express. Je recommande vivement !

Giorgio was very responsive with my check in time, was very nice and understanding buuuuut you get what you paid for. As soon as I got there, I zipped up my suitcase and got a hotel in the village. Place was so dusty and had a strong musky odor. If you’re lucky, you’ll find pieces of pubic hair as you maneuver around the place!
Simplemente la mejor opción.
Very quiet and a comfortable place to stay!

Super appartement, Giorgio est sympathique, à 5 minutes du métro, quartier sécuritaire, stationnement à 20$ par jour derrière l’immeuble! Le seul hic: le matelas est vraiment inconfortable! On sent les ressorts! Mais bon, pour le prix y’a pas trop à se plaindre!

This place is a bit far from the center but its comfortable to go anywhere with metro.
There are 2 metro stations with 5 minutes walk.
Giorgio is a great host. Great welcome and show me how to get around the area
10/10 Giorgio is the man

Giorgio is a kind, gracious, attentive and caring host. As the Latin saying goes “Res Ispa Locatur” (the thing speaks for itself) you’ll see the cleanliness of the room, the service he provides, and the price of the room all speak for themselves. Giorgio’s superior contribution to the Air BNB concept has dispelled any bad notions I had based on my last AIR BNB experience. I truly recommend this room for anyone who travels to or within the NYC area especially if you’re coming by car. They have an excellent paid parking facility right next door that costs approximately $20 for 24 hours (versus the $35 rate downtown) which is great to leave your car and use public transportation to tour the city. I will definitely put this room on my favorites list. Thank you Giorgio, you made my stay very comforting despite the circumstances for which I came to NY for. Best wishes for your success.
-H
Loveliest host and the loveliest apartment.

Excelente anfitrión y hospedaje. Es un lugar ideal para quedarse, tiene dos líneas de metro cerca (1 y A). Un lugar tranquilo, cero ruido, apartamento con buen clima (fuimos en invierno) y limpio. Tiene cerca restaurantes buenos y a buen precio. Hay que aprovechar la cercanía al parque fort Tryon, puente george Washington’s y al museo de arte medieval cloisters.

Georgio’s place was great. Even though we only paid for a private room it felt like we had the whole place to ourselves as Giorgio made himself scarce. The room was a lot more spacious than it appears in the pictures. Safe neighborhood.

Giorgio is an excellent host. He is very responsive.  He makes sure you have your privacy and peace. You have all that you need. The room is spacious enough. The bathroom and kitchen are right outside your door. And the location is great. Can't pass up this above average value listing. I recommend it.

I stayed one month in Giorgio’s place and it’s been great! Giorgio’s room is like you see in the pictures, very spacious, with a lot of sun light, super cozy and confortable.
The neighborhood looks very authentic from NY and you can feel safe in here. There are many stores and restaurants around the apartment and a supermarket across the street. You can also get to many points of interest in the city easily by subway.
Giorgio is super nice and makes you feel very confortable at his home. So I highly recommend his place!

name: Home in New York · 3 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1.5 baths

reviews.comments: The location was incredible!! It's in walking distance to so many great places and there's a sub station at the corner. The place was the perfect size for our family.

El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, está limpio y es un lugar muy bueno; el único detalle es que los vecinos de arriba tiene problemas con el piso y escuchas desde las 6:00 am todos sus movimientos. Esto podría mejorar mi calificación.

name: Rental unit in Brooklyn · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
Rental unit in Brooklyn · ★4.65 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath

reviews.comments:
Ninell was very nice and helpful. The neighborhood was awesome with lots of shops and restaurants around. The room was very neat and well decorated like a small art museum :). We could also find everything we needed in the kitchen. Subway station was in front of the building and it takes about 40 minutes to get to times sq. It was our pleasure staying at Ninell's house. We recommend it.
Thank you Ninell

This is a very large, clean room decorated with Ninell's beautiful artwork. The apartment is right over the road from a subway station (no elevator) and a bus stop, which was important for me as I was getting around on crutches. The apartment block has an elevator and a friendly security man who regularly helped me in. It is on a relatively quiet residential street very close to Prospect park. I didn't meet Ninell but her daughter who shares the flat let me in and helped me get settled. I enjoyed my stay.

Ninell was a generous host and we had a fantastic stay at the apartment! Her place is right next to the B/Q trains, which was super convenient for a trip to the city. The apartment is also decorated with  many beautiful artworks it felt like we were in a gallery! Lastly, the bedroom we stayed in was incredibly spacious and clean. We enjoyed the experience and highly recommend this place, thanks Ninell!

My wife and I enjoyed our stay in Brooklyn.  Our host made our stay comfortable and convenient.   The apartment was warm, clean, and the room was large.  We slept very well each night.  We really enjoyed the art work.
Ninell's place is spacious and conveniently located to the subway across the street. She was very hospitable and made us feel comfortable during our stay.
Ninell was a great host. The place was clean and very spacious. The location was great as it was well connected to the city through public transport.
Great place in a great neighborhood. As described and would recommend. Close to transit and lots of shopping areas.
Very good place, excellent location and very good treatment from the host, I highly recommend it. Clean and great!

Our stay at Ninell was very comfortable and cozy. The room is spacious and quiet, with a nice relaxing vibe and adjacent bathroom.
The apartment is very close to Prospect Park and right in front of Q and B train station.
We will definitely stay again!
Excellent place to stay, the subway is just crossing the street and the Prospekt Park its just 5 minutes walking. The host is really nice and attentive. Recommended!
Ninell is one great host. She made sure I was settled in okay and welcomed my gentle giant of a dog. Highly recommend.
The building is old and a bit creepy but the house is clean. It's well communicated with Q metro line and the neighborhood is nice.
Room was perfect for what we needed. A warm place to rest our heads near family. The apt was quiet and clean. Ninell provided clean towels and shampoo and body wash. Super close to the Q.

The room is exactly as the photos shows, is beautiful, warm and big.
The subway station was very close, two minutes away.
The host was kind and friendly.
An issue that we had was that we don’t have the clean elements as soap and shampoo as the publication says and the bathroom was shared but we definitely are gonna stay there again.

Das Zimmer sieht aus wie auf den Bildern, die Sauberkeit ist für amerikanische Verhältnisse gut. Die Gastgeberin Ninell ist super nett und flexibel. Ich würde das Airbnb wieder buchen allerdings muss man auch bedenken, dass man mit der Bahn ca. 30 Minuten bis nach Midtown braucht.

Der Aufenthalt hat uns sehr gefallen. Die Wohnung liegt unweit der U-Bahn Q/B sowie der Flatbush Ave (Little Carribean) mit vielen Lokalen und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Das Zimmer ist sehr geräumig und hat auch eine kleine Sitzecke, wir konnten aber auch die Küche oder das Wohnzimmer mitnutzen. Sehr haben wir uns auch über den Wasserfilter gefreut und unsere Trinkflaschen aufgefüllt sodass wir keine Flaschen kaufen brauchten. Das Gebäude ist etwas in die Jahre gekommen was aber nicht weiter stört und die Nachbarn waren durchweg sehr freundlich. Durch die zentrale Lage mitten in Brooklyn gibt es vom Straßenverkehr her schon einen gewissen Geräuschpegel der uns aber nicht weiter gestört hat.
Ninell's room is fabulous! Very clean and close to the station. Host is so kind. I highly recommend this room!
My stay with Ninell was lovely. The room is exactly as the photo and is very close to the train station!
Good location to the train! Nice ladies hosting! No one in your business even if they’re there. Good experience
Gorgeous beautifully decorated apartment. Nice host and convenient location !

name: Rental unit in Brooklyn · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths

reviews.comments:
He’s an amazing host and is so responsive and always willing to help! He will
make sure you always get whatever it is you need!

This was my first time using AirBNB and to say this was the worst experience I’ve had is an understatement. The room pictured on the listing is 100% different than what you will actually be getting. The lights next to the bed are just fake ones stuck to the wall. The wallpaper was peeling off the wall. After I pointed this out the host began to gaslight me saying the room is what is pictured when it obviously was not. He then was very rude after I pointed this out saying “you’re frustrating me, I’m at work” as if it’s not frustrating for me to deal with him lying when I was supposed to stay there for a month. I’m sure he is used to just getting away with this kinda stuff. He’s a host he is expected to tell the truth as well as supply respectful service, but this was not the case. Please don’t stay here, it’s a scam. AirBNB fully refunded me and helped me find a new place to stay which was very helpful. It did take 3 different customer service people to really help me but it worked out

name: Serviced apartment in New York · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
Rental unit in New York · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath

reviews.comments: The apartment and location are amazing - just like the pictures. The place is safe and quiet, but surrounded by everything you could ask for. Super walkable to Bowery, Astor Place, Soho, and beyond. Both the landlord and the doormen are nice and helpful. It was a great place to call home - highly recommended!
